title: new clint is shit and invisible assassin are broken
body:
1, have no idea where to find what ever need in the new clint. every page is too bag when u open 
2, Rengar, Shaco still broken as F early game and still broken late game if u play the right way. and not a pink can't do a shit with them. 
may be people who make this patch as a assassin main player, but there are still people who play mage or ad who find this patch is not friendly to them at all. and can't do shit when an enemy team Rengar is far, ****** a cham who can one shot them and they can't do shit about it ********** **with cleanse . **

replies.body: Rengar's stealth is camouflage, so you can actually see him with a Red Ward no problem.
The client is in open beta, how hard is that to understand...
